Package marytts.unitselection.data

Class Summary
Datagram  
DiphoneUnit  
DiphoneUnitDatabase  
FeatureFileReader  
FloatArrayDatagram Extension of Datagram to provide a float array instead of (actually alongside) a byte array
HalfPhoneFeatureFileReader  
HnmDatagram A datagram that encapsulates a harmonics plus noise modelled speech frame
HnmTimelineReader A reader class for the harmonics plus noise timeline file.
LPCDatagram  
LPCTimelineReader  
MCepDatagram  
MCepTimelineReader  
SCostFileReader sCost file reader
Sentence This class represents the section of a feature file which constitutes a sentence.
SentenceIterator Iterator to provide the sentences in a given feature file, in sequence.
Syllable This class represents the section of a feature file which constitutes a sentence.
SyllableIterator  
TimelineReader The TimelineReader class provides an interface to read regularly or variably spaced datagrams from a Timeline data file in Mary format.
TimelineReader.IdxField Simple helper class to read the index fields in a timeline.
TimelineReader.Index Simple helper class to read the index part of a timeline file.
TimelineReader.ProcHeader Simple helper class to load the processing header.
Unit Representation of a unit from a unit database.
UnitDatabase The unit database of a voice
UnitFileReader Loads a unit file in memory and provides accessors to the start times and durations.
